title: Who We Are
description: An innovative university club dedicated to excellence in computer science and AI
content: Cyber Brains Club is a university club specializing in computing and advanced technology. Our club serves as a creative hub where students can explore, learn, and excel in various fields of computer science including programming, artificial intelligence, application development, and cybersecurity.

values.title: Collaborative Community
values.description: Building a supportive network of creative minds and technology enthusiasts

values.title: Innovation & Creativity
values.description: Pushing technological boundaries and finding innovative solutions to contemporary challenges

values.title: Passion for Technology
values.description: Driven by our love for programming and developing impactful technical solutions

values.title: Technical Excellence
values.description: Striving for the highest standards in all technical projects and initiatives
